Beaverton.Maplewood, Portland, Oregon:
Maplewood is a suburban neighborhood in Southwest Portland, Oregon, United States.


== Location ==
Maplewood is on Portland's western border with Garden Home, and on Multnomah County's western border with Washington County. (Small portions of the neighborhood, and thus the city of Portland, extend into Washington County.) The neighborhood is defined as the area west of SW 45th Ave.
